name: FunkIT
description:
Use WSAD on your keyboard to move around and your mouse to unleash the funk beam on your enemies.
Your beam color changes every few beats - enemies are only vulnerable to the beam of the color they are currently glowing with.
Collect bonuses to help yourself win.
Your goal is to defeat the bad robot boss guarded by lesser foes.

Made by: Marcin Słowikowski, Mateusz Jaworski, Piotr Szekalski, Tuan Chau, Łukasz Kobryn
